item.title: Nationwide to cut interest rates on 37 savings accounts
item.description: Nationwide Building Society is slashing interest rates following the Bank of England’s decision to lower the base rate in December

item.title: Taiwan Semiconductor shares jump on AI outlook
item.description: TSMC, Nvidia’s key supplier, has beaten on earnings and poured cold water on talk of an AI bubble

item.title: Zoopla: Number of homes on sale at eight-year peak – but demand lagging behind 2025
item.description: The average number of homes listed for sale per estate agent at the start of the year breached 30, property portal Zoopla said

item.title: Two million taxpayers to be hit by £100k tax trap by 2026/27
